intent_atoms.description: Introduced a shared RandomAccessReaderError taxonomy and updated MappedReader, ChunkedFileReader, and InMemoryRandomAccessReader to emit consistent bounds, overflow, and IO errors.
Unit tests cover negative offsets, invalid counts, overflow detection, and IO propagation for chunked and mapped reader suites.

functional_units.name: RandomAccessReaderError taxonomy
functional_units.description: Defines a shared error type hierarchy for bounds, overflow, and IO errors across random access readers.

functional_units.name: MappedReader error handling
functional_units.description: Updates MappedReader to emit consistent RandomAccessReaderError instances for invalid operations.

functional_units.name: ChunkedFileReader error handling
functional_units.description: Updates ChunkedFileReader to emit consistent RandomAccessReaderError instances for negative offsets, invalid counts, overflow detection, and IO propagation.

functional_units.name: InMemoryRandomAccessReader error handling
functional_units.description: Updates InMemoryRandomAccessReader to emit consistent RandomAccessReaderError instances for bounds and overflow errors.

functional_units.name: Unit tests for negative offset handling
functional_units.description: Provides unit coverage testing negative offsets in random access readers.

functional_units.name: Unit tests for invalid count handling
functional_units.description: Test suite covering invalid (non‑positive) counts in read operations.
